archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Office of the Dean of Students Office Administrative Files
1976-1991

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions apply only to specific student records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.).

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Office of the Dean of Students Office Administrative Files, Accession #RG-18/2/1.951, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred to the library on 1995 March 8.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Topical files from Dean Robert T. Canevari's office, including files on individual fraternities and sororities.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p:
Series I: General Records Boxes 1-18
Series II: Sororities Boxes 19-21
Series III: Fraternities Boxes 22-25
Series IV: Restricted materials Boxes 26
